title: How should I learn CPA? - Quora

response.answer_text: You will be required to have a certain amount of accounting classes in an accredited college before you can become a CPA as well a 4 year degree and a specific number of credit hours. Once you have met the schooling requirements you can move forward to studying specifically what is on the CPA Exam. It is highly recommended to get a study guide to help pass the exam. When I passed the CPA exam I used Gleim, but there are other study guides as well. It is important to have a good study strategy for tackling the exam. Here is an example of a study strategy that was used to pass the exam without failing. My CPA Exam Study Guide Experience Remember there are four sections of the exam and you need a 75 or above to pass. You don’t want to have to retake any sections, so pass the first time.

If you want to build up a good knowledge base and you learn best in an instructional setting, then signing up for a 1 or 2 year program may be your best option. In this program, you will learn how to start a career as an online marketer, including getting started with CPA marketing. Like most types of online marketing, CPA marketing is changing constantly. Those who are most successful are able to learn through trial and error and constant research into new techniques. It is not necessary to take a degree program in order to be successful.If you want to know more about this you can follow from our sitecpazer.com
